title: Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special Trailer Reaction
description:
We react to the MCU Special Presentation trailer for GOTG Holiday Special starring Chris Pratt, Dave Bautista, Kevin Bacon, and more!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
